H0.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 1992 Barcelona

H1.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 1996 Atlanta

H2.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 2000 Sydney

H3.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 1984 LOS ANGELES

A4.text: synchronized swimming did not become an official Olympic sport until the 1984 Summer Olympic Games

A5.text: From 1984 through 1992, the Summer Olympic Games featured solo and duet competitions

A6.text: Synchronized swimming and rhythmic gymnastics debuted in Los Angeles as Olympic events

A7.text: The 1984 Summer Olympics were held in Los Angeles, California, United States
